name: aptos-contract-deployer
description: A minimal backend to compile and deploy Aptos Move contracts.

scripts.vercel-build: wget -O aptos-cli.zip https://github.com/aptos-labs/aptos-core/releases/download/aptos-cli-v1.0.0/aptos-cli-1.0.0-Ubuntu-x86_64.zip && unzip aptos-cli.zip && mv aptos /usr/local/bin/ && rm aptos-cli.zip
